img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e1/Wukong_MiddleHollow_49.jpg)
One particularly large cocoon seems to be grunting, but it's not the return of the Venom Daoist. Instead, give it a wack to find your old pal the Horse Guai on the next part of his adventure!
img_below_text:
Once again he'll thank you for your part in helping along his quest, and will hope to cross your path again at the Flaming Mountains, so look forward to that!
Talk to the Horse Guai some more to learn more of his story, and then head through the rest of the cocoon field, dealing with a few more Amourworms as you go.

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Context:

One particularly large cocoon seems to be grunting, but it's not the return of the Venom Daoist. Instead, give it a wack to find your old pal the Horse Guai on the next part of his adventure!"
            - Following Text: "Once again he'll thank you for your part in helping along his quest, and will hope to cross your path again at the Flaming Mountains, so look forward to that!
Talk to the Horse Guai some more to learn more of his story, and then head through the rest of the cocoon field, dealing with a few more Amourworms as you go."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist encounters the Horse Guai, a familiar character, in a cavernous area filled with cocoons and rocky formations. The Horse Guai is seated and illuminated by a hanging lantern, engaging in conversation with the protagonist. This meeting is part of the Horse Guai's ongoing adventure, and he expresses gratitude for the protagonist's help, hinting at a future reunion at the Flaming Mountains. The image serves to illustrate this narrative moment of camaraderie and foreshadows further developments in the storyline.
